explanations.c: TRIACS are the components used in controlling the AC signals.It is used in high power switching applications It is used in domestic fan controlThe TRIAC is a 3-terminal semiconductor device and may be considered equivalent to two SCRS connected in antiparallel.TRIAC are bidirectional devices.
